title: Myocarditis is a rare but real Covid vaccine side effect. A new study sheds light on what might cause it
description: Study points to source of "very, very rare" cases of myocarditis and potential solutions. Myocarditis risk remains far higher from Covid than the vaccine.
content: Study points to source of "very, very rare" cases of myocarditis and potential solutions. Myocarditis risk remains far higher from Covid than the vaccine.
